Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Well would you look at that! The shop looks great!

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: And you even built a back room! Of course! Where else would you sleep, now that you took down the tent.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: That hard work pays off.. Oh yeah! I just remembered that we will in fact have someone new moving here soon.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Her name is Maple. The other day she stopped by briefly to check out the area while you were working.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: She said didn't want to disturb you but she will come say hi when she moves in.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Until then have a good one. Nice job again.
